title: Why is there a (Q) behind inspect on the context menu?
content: The right click context menu shows Inspect with a (Q) behind it. But pressing Q, or ctrl+q, shift+Q or alt+Q does nothing. Is this a leftover from a time Q worked?
creator: theking2

title: Taal spellingcontrole veranderen
content:
Nederlands Language Pack is geinstalleerd, maar de spellingscontrole staat op Engels.

Als ik in het dropdownmenu op Talen klik , verschijnt er enkel Engels. Bij Woordenboek toevoegen, blijkt het Nederlands Language Pack reeds geinstalleerd want daar staat 'Verwijderen'. Hoe verander ik de spellingcontrole naar Nederlands ?

title: Logging in to web page
content: The Apple tv web page won't allow me to log in when I open it in Firefox. It will open fine in Safari. Why and can that be fixed? Thanks.
creator: fm5mnv2ngy

title: How to make Firefox go back to the timestamp of a video where you left off
content:
On other browsers, such as Opera and Brave, when watching a video, and then closing out of the browser, and later coming back to the video, it saves the timestamp at which you closed out the browser (or goes back around 10 seconds). On Firefox, this doesn't seem to be the case. Is this intentional? Can I enable this somehow?

(Btw, I know that there is an extension for this specifically for YouTube, but I'm referring to other streaming sites, and just videos in general)

Any help is appreciated, thanks!
creator: gusthesupercoolseal

title: gfx.webrender.software being on makes some videos have square artifacts
